text.tspan: Share of the population using drinking water facilities, 2000

g.text: No access (surface water only)No access (surface water only)

text.tspan: Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP) (2024)
